message.content:
cs.DB, cs.AI, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.SE. 

The paper discusses the use of semantic technology to improve querying efficiency in database systems. This topic falls under the domain of database systems and information retrieval, which are covered by the cs.DB and cs.IR sub-categories. The paper also mentions the extraction of hidden relationships between entity sets, which involves the use of artificial intelligence techniques such as machine learning and natural language processing, which are covered by the cs.AI sub-category. The paper also discusses the limitations of syntactic queries and the need for semantic connections, which are related to the field of natural language processing and machine learning, covered by the cs.LG sub-category. Finally, the paper proposes a solution to improve querying efficiency, which involves the development of new software tools and techniques, which are covered by the cs.SE sub-category.
